name: Revenge
description: Ronald Tobias's archetypal plot driven by the need to settle a score or right a wrong
distribution_philosophy: Based on Tobias's revenge structure emphasizing the wrong, planning, and final confrontation
examples: The Count of Monte Cristo, Kill Bill, Gladiator

the_wrong.name: The Wrong
the_wrong.description: A terrible injustice is committed against the protagonist or someone they care about

recognition.name: Recognition
recognition.description: The protagonist recognizes the need for revenge and commits to action

preparation.name: Preparation
preparation.description: The protagonist plans and prepares for their revenge

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.description: The protagonist actively pursues their target, facing obstacles

confrontation.name: Confrontation
confrontation.description: The final confrontation between the protagonist and their target
